title: The Barossa
creator_credit: Albert Falzon Productions, South Australian Film Corporation and David Lourie
brief_description: Unsurpassed scenery, friendly people, vintage festivals, a pleasant sip of wine and unrivalled cuisine - all are part of the Barossa. This film shows the places, people and traditional events which make the Barossa Valley one of Australia’s most exciting wine districts.
creator_credit_for_label: Albert Falzon Productions, South Australian Film Corporation and David Lourie
